modName: Sheogoraths WabbaPack - The Print Your Own Pack PDF
summary:
The Perfect Gift for any Skyrim Addict.
Too mean to go down to the shops and buy a proper present for your loved ones?
Download & Print your own Pack of Collectable Cards, and play a Game fit for the Gods.
We present to you... "Sheogorath's WabbaPack - The Print Your Own Pack PDF"
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XSeXXl6.png[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/q0SstoV.png[/IMG][/center]
[size=2]Some of you may have seen these cards already as the Skyrim Top Trumps collection. Unfortunately due to trademark issues, we've had to rebrand the collection of cards. We asked you guys for ideas on new names and [b]Sheagoraths WappaPack[/b] was born (thanks [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/669024]Blood_Reaper[/url]).

There are two project using the collection...
This [color=yellow][b]Sheagorath's WabbaPack PDF[/b][/color], which allows you to print the cards off and play with you friends (if you still have any after playing Skyrim for 2 years). This is the result of the hard work of the hugely talented [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1937550]MapleVolt[/url].
There is also the option to install an actual mod, so that you can collect [color=yellow][b]Sheagoraths WabbaPack in Game[/b][/color]. This feat of witchcraft is brought to you by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1398716]IceBurg[/url] (who has an understanding of the Mystical Creation Kit). Checkout the [b]Fantastic Sheogorath's WabbaPack Mod[/b]... COMING SOON

[color=yellow][b]HOW TO USE [/color][/b]
It is a PDF. So just download and print. Simple (just like me).
[b]Caution:[/b] Please ensure small children and Orcs are supervised when handling scissors.

[color=yellow][b]VERSION HISTORY[/color][/b]
Version 1 - In PDF format and no intentions to change.

[color=yellow][b]THANKS TO... [/color][/b]
The immensely talented [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1937550]MapleVolt[/url] for his work on the PDF and the creative input over the last few months. A real pleasure to work with (and very patient).
This time around we could work with all parties from the start and so a huge thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1398716]IceBurg[/url] for once again agreeing to work with us.
And of course, Bethesda, for an excellent addition to TES series

If you see any mistakes, catch me in Skyrim Nexus at [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/545970]Reimar67[/url] [/size]
author: Reimar67 and MapleVolt
